Name: LU 610 - Zoning, Bridge Park South Mapping, Bronx (C 190508 MMX)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 190508 MMX, an amendment to the City Map (L.U. No. 610).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the New York City Department of Parks and Recreation, filed an application pursuant to Sections 197-c and 199 of the New York City Charter, and Section 5-430 \i et seq.\i0  of the New York City Administrative Code for an amendment to the City Map involving:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\f1\'b7\tab\f0 the elimination, discontinuance and closing of Exterior Street between the High Bridge and the Alexander Hamilton Bridge;\par
\f1\'b7\tab\f0 the elimination, discontinuance and closing of West 171st Street between Exterior Street and the U.S. Pierhead and Bulkhead Line;\par
\f1\'b7\tab\f0 the establishment of public park; \par
\f1\'b7\tab\f0 the adjustment block dimensions and grades necessitated thereby;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj including authorization for any acquisition or disposition of real property related thereto, in accordance with Map No. 13144 dated June 24, 2019 and signed by the Borough President,  (ULURP No. C 190508 MMX), Community District \-4, Borough of The Bronx (the \ldblquote Application\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\cf1\par
\pard\ltrpar\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on January 21, 2020 its decision dated January 8, 2020 (the "Decision"), on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\ri144\qj\cf0 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on January 30, 2020;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued May 23\super rd\nosupersub , 2019 (CEQR No. 18DPR007X), (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ). \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sa240\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sa240\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 199 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, C 190508 MMX, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision for an amendment to the City Map involving: \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f1\'b7\tab\f0 the elimination, discontinuance and closing of Exterior Street between the High Bridge and the Alexander Hamilton Bridge;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\f1\'b7\tab\f0 the elimination, discontinuance and closing of West 171st Street between Exterior Street and the U.S. Pierhead and Bulkhead Line;\par
\f1\'b7\tab\f0 the establishment of public park; \par
\f1\'b7\tab\f0 the adjustment block dimensions and grades necessitated thereby;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720 including authorization for any acquisition or disposition of real property related thereto, in Community District 4, Borough of  The Bronx, in accordance with Map No. 13144 dated June 24, 2019 and signed by the Borough President, is approved; and be it further \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\b RESOLVED\b0  that, pursuant to Section 5-432 of the New York City Administrative Code, \ldblquote such closing or discontinuance will further the health, safety, pedestrian or vehicular circulation, housing, economic development or general welfare of the City\rdblquote ; and be it further\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\b\f0 RESOLVED \b0 that, pursuant to Section 5-433 of the New York City Administrative Code, the legally required number of counterparts of Map No. 13144 dated June 24, 2019 have been adopted, providing for the elimination, discontinuance and closing of Exterior Street between the High Bridge and the Alexander Hamilton Bridge and the elimination, discontinuance and closing of West 171st Street between Exterior Street and the U.S. Pierhead and Bulkhead Line, said streets to be discontinued and closed being more particularly described as follows:\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\ul\b\f0 DISCONTINUANCE AND CLOSING OF A PORTION OF EXTERIOR STREET BETWEEN THE HIGH BRIDGE AND THE ALEXANDER HAMILTION BRIDGE AND THE DISCONTINUANCE AND CLOSING OF EAST 171\super ST\nosupersub  STREET BETWEEN EXTERIOR STREET AND THE U.S. PIERHEAD AND BULKHEAD LINE\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\ulnone\b0\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f0 Starting at a point of tangency on the United States Pierhead and Bulkhead line, thence running 105.00 feet, along the United States Pierhead and Bulkhead Line, in a northerly direction, to the point or place of beginning;\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f2\par
\f0 1.\tab Thence, running 128.93 feet, in an easterly direction, on a line that makes a deflection angle to the left of 99 degrees-11 minutes - 23 seconds, with the previous course, to a point on the westerly line of Exterior Street, discontinued and closed;\f2\par
\par
\f0 2.\tab Thence running 653.51 feet, in a southerly direction, along said westerly line of Exterior Street, discontinued and closed, on a line which makes an exterior angle to the left , with the previous course of 84 degrees-00 minutes- 00 seconds; to a point of curvature;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 3.\tab Thence running 108.32 feet, in a southerly direction, on a curve to the right, which has a radius of 777.00 feet, and a central angle of 7 degrees-59 minutes-16 seconds, to a point of tangency;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 4.\tab Thence running 89.59 feet, in a southerly direction, on a tangent to said curve to a point of curvature;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 5.\tab Thence running 186.73 feet, in a southerly direction, on a curve to the left, which has a radius of 823.00 feet, and a central angle of 13 degrees-00 minutes-00 seconds to a point;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 6.\tab Thence running 19.91 feet, in a southerly direction, on a tangent to said curve, to a point;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 7.\tab Thence running 3.0 feet, in a westerly direction, along a radial line, to a point on a curve;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 8.\tab Thence, running 26.70 feet, in a southerly direction, along a curve to the left with a radius of 1400.00 feet, and central angle of 1 degree-05 minutes-35 seconds to a point;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 9.\tab Thence running 40.90 feet in a northeasterly direction to a point on a curve;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 10.\tab Thence, running 18.58 feet, in a northwesterly direction, on a curve to the right with radius of 1400.00 and central angle of 1 degrees-05 minutes-35 seconds, to a point of tangency;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 11.\tab Thence, 19.91 feet in a northwesterly direction to a point of curvature;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 12.\tab Thence, 178.11 feet, in a northerly direction, on a curve to the right with a radius of 785.00 feet and central angle of 13 degrees-00 minutes-00 seconds, to a point of tangency;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 13.\tab Thence running 89.59 feet, in a northerly direction to a point of curvature;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 14.\tab Thence running 113.62 feet, in a northerly direction, on a curve to the right with a radius of 815.00 feet and a central angle of 7 degrees-59 minutes-16 seconds, to a point;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 15.\tab Thence running 2.0 feet, in an easterly direction, on a radial line, to a point;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 16.\tab Thence, running 718.05 feet, in a northerly direction, to a point;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 17.\tab Thence, running 165.75 feet in a westerly direction, on a line that makes an interior angle of 84 degrees-00 minutes-00 seconds with the previous course, to a point on the United States Pierhead and Bulkhead Line;\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 18.\tab Thence running 60.78 feet, in a southerly direction, along the United States Pierhead and Bulkhead Line, to the Point or Place of beginning.\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\f2\par
\f0 Said discontinued and closed contains an area of 47,472 square feet (1.08 acres), more or less.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\b RESOLVED \b0 that, pursuant to subdivision 1a of Section 5-433 of the New York City  Administrative Code, public utility facilities within the subsurface of the streets cited herein  which are to be discontinued and closed by this action, may be maintained in place or relocated within such subsurface by the public utility, so that such maintenance in place or relocation of such facilities is consistent with the proposed use of the closed portion or portions of such subsurface, and the requirements of other facilities located therein;\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f0 All such approvals being subject to the following conditions:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 a.\tab The subject amendment to the City Map shall take effect on the day following the day on which certified counterparts of Map No. 13144 dated June 24, 2019 are filed with the appropriate agencies in accordance with Section 198 subsection c of the New York City Charter.\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 b.\tab The subject street to be discontinued and closed shall be discontinued and closed on the day following the day on which such maps adopted by this resolution shall be filed in the offices specified by law.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 Adopted.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\tab The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx1440\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab\tab I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on February 27, 2020, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\par
\par
